Review Text: (Translated by Google) This pizzeria was recommended to us by our hostess. It said it was the best pizza in Amsterdam. We were not disappointed. Rarely eaten such an authentic and good pizza. Great decor and nice staff. It is worth it! ‚Ä¶

Name: Pazzi
Review Text: (Translated by Google) The pizza dough is really great. Of course whatever goes on. You cannot make a reservation, but you can already drink a glass of wine at the bar if you have to wait a while. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pazzi
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious pizza and nice place to sit. Service is unfortunately becoming less and less. Turns more and more to enjoy, there is speed and a long night no more. Unfortunately! Previously I had certainly given 5 stars. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pazzi
Review Text: (Translated by Google) I recently picked up here. The pizzas were large, had a nice thin and crispy base and were richly topped with tasty ingredients. Really a place to visit more often. ‚Ä¶

Name: Pazzi
